name.en: Poseidra Abyss, the Atlantean Dragon Deity
name.ja: <ruby>海<rt>かい</rt></ruby><ruby>皇<rt>おう</rt></ruby><ruby>龍<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>しん</rt></ruby> ポセイドラ・アビス

text.en:
3 Level 7 monsters
Once per turn, you can also Xyz Summon "Poseidra Abyss, the Atlantean Dragon Deity" by using 1 "Atlantean" or "Mermail" Xyz Monster you control. (Transfer its materials to this card.) Once per turn: You can detach 2 materials from this card and send 1 WATER monster from your hand or Deck to the GY; return up to 3 cards your opponent controls to the hand. If this Xyz Summoned card is sent to the GY: You can discard 1 card to the GY; Special Summon 3 Level 3 or lower Fish, Sea Serpent, and/or Aqua monsters from your hand and/or GY.

ja.set_name: Rage of the Abyss +1 Bonus Pack
